# Gabriel

> Privacy-first "guardian angel" LLM that offers local security guidance. Runs on Python 3.10+ and supports offline or encrypted inference via [token.place](https://github.com/futuroptimist/token.place).

Gabriel encourages minimal telemetry and keeps user data local. Documentation covers threat models, improvement plans and example prompts.

## Docs
- [README](README.md): Project overview
- [Threat Model](docs/gabriel/THREAT_MODEL.md)
- [Improvements](docs/gabriel/IMPROVEMENTS.md)
- [FAQ](docs/gabriel/FAQ.md)

## Related Projects
- [token.place](https://github.com/futuroptimist/token.place): Encrypted inference API
- [sigma](https://github.com/futuroptimist/sigma): Optional analysis helpers

## Models
- GPT-4o-2024-05-13
- Claude-3 Opus
- Mistral Large
- Llama3-70b-Instruct
- Qwen1.5 1.8B
- Gemma 2B

## Optional
- [Flywheel Risk Model](docs/gabriel/FLYWHEEL_RISK_MODEL.md)
